name: stark-tic-tac-toe
description: Provable Tic-Tac-Toe built onchain on Starknet using Dojo

scripts.build-e: cd engine && sozo build && scarb fmt
scripts.test-e: cd engine && sozo test && scarb fmt
scripts.buid-c: cd client && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build
scripts.check: cd client && pnpm run build && pnpm run lint && cd ../engine && sozo build && sozo test && scarb fmt

author: SoarinSkySagar
